author: Christian Zamora Buzzfeed Staff
title: Justin Bieber Served Shady Ex-Boyfriend While Joking "Starboy" Is His Favorite Song
text: Your Post Has Been Launched! Fabulous! Don't forget to share with your friends on Twitter and Facebook. Justin Bieber Served Shady Ex-Boyfriend While Joking "Starboy" Is His Favorite Song It’s funny because Selena is dating The Weeknd now. Christian Zamora BuzzFeed Staff 1. Justin Bieber was doing one of those Instagram Live things with his BFF Alfredo Flores when he sarcastically claimed his favorite song at the moment is “Starboy” by The Weeknd (AKA the man who’s now dating Justin’s ex, Selena Gomez): youtube.com ID: 10522230 2. Justin then broke out into hilarious laughter and had to tell Fredo to end the live stream because “it was too funny.”
